nodes.text: Bespin Direct was a travel agency that was a member of the Galactic Tourist Bureau. Prior to the Battle of Yavin, the company offered daily nonstop trips to Cloud City and Hoth on board a fleet of customized StarSpeeder 1000s. At the time, Bespin Direct operated a spaceliner terminal on Spaceport THX1138's north wing. The company's slogan was, "The non-stop spaceline that never stops caring."
